author: uschindler
msg: SOLR-3849: Pass "-Djava.awt.headless=true" to test runner to prevent enabling AWT, spawning threads and modifying sysprops. Tests need no GUI and this also mimics the behaviour of the default startup scripts of Tomcat and Jetty.

author: mamta
